title: BitSler support
author: BitSler support
created_time: June 02, 2023, 02:19:38 PMLast edit: June 08, 2023, 04:02:56 PM by BitSler support
content: UPDATE: IT'S NOW $5 FREE BET!!! Join here      Bitsler.com $5 NBA Free BetExclusive To All Pinoy Players OnlyWHO WE ARESince 2015,  Bitsler  has been one of the most popular cryptocurrency casinos in the market, offering a range of options from casino games to sportsbook with competitive odds and fast transfers. We have over 4000 games, including classics such as dice, roulette, crash, blackjack, and slot machines, as well as a wide selection of esports matches and sports events to bet on.RULES‚Ä£ Promotion Duration: This campaign will take place from June 2nd at 14:00 UTC to June 11th at 23:59 UTC;‚Ä£ The specified amount will be credited to the new player's account upon registration* and is limited to 200 claims. This credited amount must be exclusively utilized for placing bets on the NBA Finals and will only be credited to players from the Philippines;‚Ä£ Bitsler reserves the right to withhold fund credits or confiscate previously credited funds in cases of suspicious or fraudulent activity;‚Ä£ General Terms and Conditions Apply;‚Ä£ *Completion of the KYC verification process is mandatory before the balance can be credited.

comments.author: jamyr
comments.created_time: June 03, 2023, 06:04:29 AMLast edit: June 08, 2023, 11:18:48 AM by jamyr
comments.body: PEEENOISE make some noise. XDSo I would suggest a step by step guide how would be players can take adv of this promo. Like this one :Just register an account on bitsler.comüëâüèº NO deposit required to claim the bonus.(withdrawal does have a minimum tho)üëâüèº Complete the verification process, üëâüèº The $5 will be automatically credited to your account.üëâüèº You can join the free bonus promotion on the promotion page, there are a lot of benefits there!üòç In FilipinoMag sign up lang sa bitsler.comKumpletuhin ang verification process, Di kailangan ng deposit para sa bonus, kung sakaling manalo ang iyong taya, at ito ay hindi mas mababa sa minimum withdraw amount, eh congratulations maaari mo nang i withdraw ang iyong napanalunan.(Kung sakaling may katanungan, pwede niyo po akong i message sa telegram: @jamyr12 )

comments.author: malcovi2
comments.body: Quote from: jamyr on June 03, 2023, 06:04:29 AMPEEENOISE make some noise. XDNot worth it para sa akin dahil parang ibebenta mo na yung data mo for $2.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: malcovi2 on June 04, 2023, 01:50:59 AMQuote from: jamyr on June 03, 2023, 06:04:29 AMPEEENOISE make some noise. XDNot worth it para sa akin dahil parang ibebenta mo na yung data mo for $2.Yeah, Ok na sana itong promotion na ito kung bonus code nalang para maclaim kahit na mga old player sa casino. Halos maliit na value na yung 2$ kung ikukumpara sa mandatory KYC requirements na pwede naman makapag bet sa ibang sportsbook na may odds boost na walang KYC requirements.Salamat pa din Bitsler sa pagbibigay na special promotion para sa mga kabayan namin pero hindi worth-it yung 2$ para sa manadstory KYC. Madaming sportsbook kagaya ng Duelbits na namimigay ng cashdrop at free spin na walang KYC requirements no string attached. Sana maconsider ito kung sakali man na may susunod kayo na promotion. May IP tracker naman kayo at pwede nyong gamitin ang Bitcointalk usernames namin para mdetect na from PH ang players.

XDNot worth it para sa akin dahil parang ibebenta mo na yung data mo for $2.andaming nag ooffer ng data buying para lang sa ganitong halaga ang i offer ng Bistler¬† and knowing Bistler as one of the oldest gambling site in crypto? bakit di manlang sila nag present ng mas magandang event and hindi yong ganitong kababaw.and also isang point is nag invest manlang sana sila ng konding halaga para ipa translate¬† yan sa tagalog para mas maging makatotohanan ang pag lure nila sa mga pinoy .

comments.author: jamyr

comments.body: Quote from: malcovi2 on June 04, 2023, 01:50:59 AMQuote from: jamyr on June 03, 2023, 06:04:29 AMPEEENOISE make some noise. XDNot worth it para sa akin dahil parang ibebenta mo na yung data mo for $2.Priceless naman dapat data natin, so I get your point. Established naman na rin si bitsler as a tustworthy platform.Ang $5 na bonus ay isa lamang sa mga promosyon na available sa mga kyc verified na players. Quote from: Coin_trader on June 04, 2023, 11:25:01 AMYeah, Ok na sana itong promotion na ito kung bonus code nalang para maclaim kahit na mga old player sa casino. Halos maliit na value na yung 2$ kung ikukumpara sa mandatory KYC requirements na pwede naman makapag bet sa ibang sportsbook na may odds boost na walang KYC requirements.Salamat pa din Bitsler sa pagbibigay na special promotion para sa mga kabayan namin pero hindi worth-it yung 2$ para sa manadstory KYC. Madaming sportsbook kagaya ng Duelbits na namimigay ng cashdrop at free spin na walang KYC requirements no string attached. Sana maconsider ito kung sakali man na may susunod kayo na promotion. May IP tracker naman kayo at pwede nyong gamitin ang Bitcointalk usernames namin para mdetect na from PH ang players.Sarap ng no strings attached, kaso bilang pinoy alam natin na tayo ay isa mga country na kilala na nag account farming. Di mo naman ata need na max level verification.Mag iisip ako ng irerecommendang other way to improve this promo.Quote from: peter0425 on June 05, 2023, 04:11:12 AMQuote from: malcovi2 on June 04, 2023, 01:50:59 AMQuote from: jamyr on June 03, 2023, 06:04:29 AMPEEENOISE make some noise. XDNot worth it para sa akin dahil parang ibebenta mo na yung data mo for $2.andaming nag ooffer ng data buying para lang sa ganitong halaga ang i offer ng Bistler ¬†and knowing Bistler as one of the oldest gambling site in crypto? bakit di manlang sila nag present ng mas magandang event and hindi yong ganitong kababaw.and also isang point is nag invest manlang sana sila ng konding halaga para ipa translate ¬†yan sa tagalog para mas maging makatotohanan ang pag lure nila sa mga pinoy .Sa bitcointalk di na siguro need ng translation, simple lang naman yang terms na yan. Pero thanks sa suggestionOne of the oldest naman talaga, si bitsler. Wala naman talagang amount na worth it ibenta ang data mo, siguro ibang way ng kyc process para hindi magamit sa iba.
